name: Tonjin
description:
You are the Administrator of province no. 112 of People's Republic of Tonjin. Do your duty.

Goal:

1. Complete the objectives decided by the Supreme Parliament.

2. Keep people happy (Happiness>0)  by the end of a term

Extra Instruction:

1.Only Mouse required for actual gameplay

2. Click  LMB on land (square tiles) to build the structure you chose.

3. Click  MMB to hide Instruction Texts inside the game.
